data.text: Davide ná-guyei.
Mazɔlɔɔ ta ʋoolozu, eɠɛ tufai,
Ɠaliva Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ma, è ɗa faa ʋagɔi ɠɛ,
Ɗa-undaanɛɛi ɠaiziɛ Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ya,
È-maavaiti kpein zɛ Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI yeezu,
Toɠa ɗa-zɔledai ɠula kɛlɛma eɠɛ wozakalagi,
Maaɠɛ kpɔ Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠaazu, tɔun maaɓɔun,
Ɓe ziiɠaawanai ʋa, è ziiɠulagi yɛ ná,
Mazɔlɔɔ niiti ti faa ɲɔi ɠɛɛzu, naati ta leʋezu ga,
Ná tago nɔ ʋe na, faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nui la mɔ ɠaa!
Ɓɔɠɔmaayei nuiti ta zooi zɔlɔɔ ga tɔnɔ,
Faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nui ɠa ɗa kisiɛ ɲɔiti kpɛtɛ telebo nui laalɔɠɔma,
Anɛɛ naa ʋe, Maliɠii ɠa ɲɛɛɠulazu su,
Faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nuiti ta ɗa boɠa zɔkpɔi ɠula su,
Tiya ɓɔɠɔi ta-woɠa zɔkpɔi ɠa ti yiiɓota,
Nii goi é telebo nui ya naa vizɔgɛ,
Tɔɔzei faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nuiti ta-zobogi zu ɠa ɠoloɠolo,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI sɔbalala nuiti ta-eteai ɠwɛɛ,
Ti la unfega maanɔɠɔ ziɛgi zu,
Faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nuiti undaa ɠa ʋili,
Nu ɲɔi ɠa ɗa kuyei zeɠe, kɛlɛ é la kulaa ʋolu.
Mazɔlɔɔ niiti Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI tuya loozu ti ʋɛ, naati ta zooi zɔlɔɔ ga tɔnɔ,
Siɛgi zu nui ziɛ ʋelei nɛɛzu la Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ʋɛ,
Ni a loona, é la vɛzɛɠɛlɛga,
Gè ɠɛni ga doungoi, gè wɔlɔzaɠaga,
Toɠa ɗa maawɔinɠai ɠɛ, é kuye ʋɛɛ nu ma,
Ʋoluave faa ɲɔi ʋa, è faa ʋagɔi ɠɛ,
Mazɔlɔɔ sɔlegi nɛɛʋɛ Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ʋɛ,
Telebo nuiti ta zooi zɔlɔɔ ga tɔnɔ,
Telebo nuiti ta ɗa ɠima ɓɔɛiti bo,
Ta-ƓALAGI ná-tɔgi ɠa ti-yiimaʋɛ,
Faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nui ɠa ɗa telebo nui maayaava,
Kɛlɛ Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI la yeeɓega ba, é ʋa zɛ zeezu,
Ɠito Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ʋa,
Gè nu ɲɔi ɠaa, é ná-zobodai kpein su,
É leʋeni, wɛlɛ, é la mɔ ná.
Ɠida GALA gaazuluaba nui ná-fai wu, nui naa ʋɛtɛ nii sɔlegai,
Kɛlɛ kpaka nuiti kpein ta ɠoloɠolo,
Telebo nuiti ta-ɠizogi ɠa ʋaazu, é zeɠe Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ʋɔ bɛ.
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa ɓɔ ti ʋa, é ti unmɔɔ.
